bibl.title: Bags and Pouches in the Roman and Early Byzantine World.
bibl.note: 1. Introduction. - 2. Basketry. - 3. Leather bags and pouches. - 4. Textile sacks. - 5. Textile bags. - 6. Knotted net containers. - 7. Textile pouches. - 8. Pouches in single-needle knitting. - 9. Pockets in garments. - 10. Conclusion.

bibl.title: assisted by Elisabeth Ehler, Dress Accessories of the 1st Millennium AD from Egypt. Proceedings of the 6th Conference of the Research Group 'Textiles from the Nile Valley', Antwerp, 2-3 October 2009.

bibl.seg: Linscheid Petra, Bags and Pouches in the Roman and Early Byzantine World.
